valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Wed 1 Oct 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Thu 2 Oct 2025
general_synopsis: Low 300 miles west of Iceland 977 expected 250 miles north of Iceland 979 by 0600 Thursday. New high expected just west of FitzRoy 1025 by same time

FitzRoy.text:
Wind
In south, cyclonic 2 to 4, occasionally 5 at first. In north, southerly or southwesterly 3 to 5, occasionally 6 later.
Sea state
In south, moderate. in north, moderate, occasionally rough in west.
Weather
In south, fair. In north, occasional rain in west.
Visibility
In south, good. In north, moderate or good, occasionally poor in west.
